title: Integrated Instructional Design of Learner Growth Processes and Flow Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-Level Practical Experience in Social Fields and Basic Digital Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Customized learning scenario design course for enhancing the job competencies of current practitioners, emphasizing interactive and feedback-enhanced learning through digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain the four core elements of Flow Theory (clear goals, immediate feedback, balance between challenge and skill, and sense of control).
Learners can design at least one immersive learning scenario that reflects the expertise level and context of the target group.
Learners can develop evaluation rubrics for each of the three stages of the learning growth process (foundation acquisition → application → creation) when applying design scenarios.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
